channel.title: xrdGlory
channel.description:
# xrdGlory
![image|400x400, 100%](upload://moeJCDUR6frClJHsQeFDxZqs0PT.png)
> How high do you think the price of XRD will go? A new kind of NFT project that depends on the price of XRD. Reaching set price levels triggers the generation of unique art. **Price of each NFT**: Depends on how high you think XRD will go! Starting from 15 XRD for a price point of $10, to 125 XRD for a price point of $0.7 **Links**: * [Website](https://xrdglory.com/) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/xrdGlory) * [Telegram](https://t.me/XRDglory)

item.description:
xrdGlory

How high do you think the price of XRD will go?
A new kind of NFT project that depends on the price of XRD. Reaching set price levels triggers the generation of unique art.

Price of each NFT: Depends on how high you think XRD will go! Starting from 15 XRD for a price point of $10, to 125 XRD for a price point of $0.7
